sections.heading: African-American Affairs Commission. Membership. Vacancies. Duties. Annual report. Staff. Authority.
sections.text:
Section 2-121 is repealed, effective July 1, 2016.

(June 18 Sp. Sess. P.A. 97-11, S. 24, 65; Sept. Sp. Sess. P.A. 09-7, S. 144; P.A. 10-1, S. 3; June 12 Sp. Sess. P.A. 12-2, S. 40; May Sp. Sess. P.A. 16-3, S. 209.)
